message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I know you'll find valuable. I'm asking for $14,000, which I believe is a fair price considering its worth. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a serious offer. Can you consider my counteroffer?
Bob, I appreciate you countering.  While $12,000 is tempting, I know the true value of this product.  Would you consider meeting me at $13,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll counter with $12,500. Can you consider my offer?
